name: Labyrinth
goal: Labyrinth Center deals with the prevention of drug and alcohol abuse, treatment of addiction from drugs and alcohol, and the harm reduction of drug-related damages. Within the Center "Labyrinth" there are three centers: Center in Prishtina with units in Gjilan and Prizren.
interests: Education and training, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Public Health
euInitiatives:
Global Fund for HIV Prevention Program - Injecting Drug Users Component.
Labyrinth is a sub-recipient of the Global Fund for HIV Assistance in Kosovo, through CDF (Community Development Fund), within the HIV Prevention Program.
This program focuses on preventing HIV and reducing harm among vulnerable populations, which has started to be implemented by the end of 2008.
The Global Fund Program in the Labyrinth Component for Injecting Drug Users has a Harm Reduction Program, including the provision of these services in three Labyrinth Centers: Pristina, Prizren and Gjilan
